pypedream.core.stages

Functions

DEFAULT_OUTPUT_MAPPER(output)

Default output mapper that maps the return value of a stage to a dictionary with a single key DEFAULT_OUTPUT_KEY

must_bind(x)

A function that raises an UnboundInputException if the input is unbound.

prepare_inputs(inputs)

Prepare inputs to be passed in to a stage.

Classes

DependencyInputMapper(from_stage[, ...])

Input(as_arg, bind)

The Input class is a generic class that represents an input to a stage.

InputBinding(source, mapper, ...)

KeyedInputMapper(from_key[, default, required])

KeyedOutputMapper(keys, str] = NOTHING, ...)

An implementation of the StageOutputMapper protocol that maps a dictionary of values to a dictionary of outputs.

OutputMapperBehaviour(value[, names, ...])

Enum defining some basic behaviours for output mapper objects, mostly pertaining to how to handle outputs that are not explicitly defined in the mapper.

SequentialOutputMapper(keys, behaviour)

An implementation of the StageOutputMapper protocol that maps an indexable sequence of values to a dictionary of outputs.

Stage(function, ~pypedream.core.stages.R], ...)

A Stage is a wrapper around a function that is used in a Pipeline.

Exceptions

UnboundInputException

UndefinedInputException

pypedream.core.stages.prepare_inputs(inputs: list[Input]) → dict[str, Any]

Prepare inputs to be passed in to a stage. All inputs must be bound to a source before calling this method.

Parameters:

inputs (list[StageInputMapping]) – the list of input mappings to prepare

Return type:

a dictionary of inputs
